name: Targeted Ambiguous Date Parsing (Locales)
description: A Data Processing task where 'date' formats vary by 'region' (US=MM/DD/YYYY, UK=DD/MM/YYYY). The agent must calculate total sales for '2023-01' (January). Naive parsing will misinterpret days <= 12.
goal: Calculate the total sales for January 2023 (2023-01) from `data.csv`. Save the result as a single float in `result.txt`. You MUST respect the `region` column for date parsing.
